DOC.brief_summary: This is a safety and efficacy study of a Dexamethasone Drug Delivery System for anterior segment inflammation and pain following cataract extraction with lens implantation.
DOC.brief_title: A Safety and Efficacy Study of a Dexamethasone Drug Delivery System for Postoperative Inflammation and Pain After Cataract Surgery
DOC.criteria: Planned single cataract extraction with lens implant Bestcorrected visual acuity of 20/200 or better in the opposite eye Glaucoma or history of intraocular hypertension in the study eye History of chronic ocular allergy in the last year requiring treatment Scheduled for cataract surgery in the nonstudy eye during study participation
